structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

text.section: "State highway" means any public road maintained by the State Department of Highways.
"Motor vehicle" means any vehicle propelled by an internal combustion engine capable of transporting persons or property. Motor vehicle shall not mean "moped" as defined in KRS 189.285.
"Abandoned vehicle" means any motor vehicle that is left upon the right-of-way of a state highway for three (3) days, whether or not it is fit for future use.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 23, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 322, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 349, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, 20(1). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 1.
